instructions.1: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.
instructions.2: Place asparagus in a deep casserole dish; evenly coat with sesame oil and soy sauce.
instructions.3: Cook marinated asparagus on grill until tender, brushing often with marinade, 5 to 10 minutes.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the grill from Step 1 being used?
Is grill from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is grill from Step 1 still available in Step 3?
Is soy sauce live after Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to use the grill in Step 3?
